title: Условия предоставления Услуг
welcome: Добро пожаловать в MyEtherWallet, бесплатное, клиентское приложение с открытым исходным кодом для взаимодействия непосредственно с блокчейном. Пожалуйста, внимательно ознакомьтесь с данными условиями ({tos}), они применимы к вашему использованию сайта MyEtherWallet Inc. ({mew}) веб-сайт (сайт) на myetherwallet.com, и / или мобильное приложение MyEtherWallet (коллективно, {site}) и другие услуги, предлагаемые MyEtherWallet через сайт. Мы будем ссылаться на Сайт и связанные с ним услуги, предлагаемые через Сайт, как {service}.
intro-p1: Условия предоставления услуг определяют юридически обязательные условия, действующие при использования вами Услуг. Используя Услуги, вы соглашаетесь с Условия предоставления услуг, любыми дополнительными опубликованными руководящими принципами или правилами, применимыми к конкретным услугам и функциям, и нашим {privPol} (вместе, {agreement}). Если вы принимаете Условия предоставления услуг от имени компании или другого юридического лица, вы заявляете и гарантируете, что у вас есть полномочия соглашаться от имени данного лица с условиями, изложенными в настоящем документе. Если у вас нет таких полномочий, или вы не согласны с Условия предоставления услуг, вы не имеете права доступа к Услугам или их использования. Вы должны согласиться с Условия предоставления услуг и Политикой конфиденциальности, когда создаете кошелек через Сайт, совершаете транзакции через Сайт и/или иным образом используете Услуги.
intro-p2: THESE TERMS OF SERVICE CONTAIN IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING YOUR LEGAL RIGHTS, REMEDIES, AND OBLIGATIONS. PLEASE NOTE THAT SECTION 9 OF THE TERMS OF SERVICE INCLUDES AN ARBITRATION AGREEMENT. EXCEPT FOR CERTAIN TYPES OF DISPUTES MENTIONED IN THAT CLAUSE, YOU AND MYETHERWALLET AGREE THAT DISPUTES BETWEEN US WILL BE RESOLVED BY MANDATORY BINDING ARBITRATION, AND YOU WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT OR CLASS ARBITRATION.
intro-p3: MyEtherWallet may, in its sole discretion, modify or revise the Terms of Service at any time, and you agree to be bound by such modifications or revisions. Although we may attempt to notify you when major changes are made to the Terms of Service, you should periodically review the most up-to-date version, which will always be posted at myetherwallet.com. Your continued use of the Services constitutes your acceptance of such changes.
services-eligibility-title-1-p: The Services are offered and available to users who are 18 years of age or older. Any registration by, use of or access to the Services by anyone under 18 is unauthorized and in violation of these Terms of Service. By using the Services, you represent and warrant that you are 18 years of age or older and that you agree to abide by the Terms of Service.
services-eligibility-title-2-p-1: The Site is a free, open-source, client-side interface that allows you to interact directly with the blockchain, while remaining in full control of your keys and funds.
services-eligibility-title-2-p-2: Получив доступ к определенным функциям Услуг, вы сможете создать кошелек и/или получить доступ к кошельку для выполнения различных транзакций. Вы получите ключ и создадите пароль, но этим вы не создаете и не создадите учетную запись на MyEtherWallet. Вы также не будете отдавать нам свои средства, а ваши токены и монеты не будут находиться на MyEtherWallet. Все средства находятся на самой блокчейне, и мы их не контролируем. Никакие данные не покидают ваш компьютер или ваш браузер. MyEtherWallet не собирает и не хранит ваши ключи и информацию. MyEtherWallet не может получать доступ к учетным записям, восстанавливать ключи, пароли или другую информацию, сбрасывать пароли или отменять транзакции. Вы несете единоличную ответственность за использование вами Услуг, в том числе за хранение, резервное копирование и сохранение конфиденциальности ваших ключей, паролей и информации, а также за безопасность любых транзакций, которые вы совершаете с помощью Сайта. Вы полностью освобождаете MyEtherWallet от любой ответственности и/или убытков, возникающих в результате использования вами Услуг.
services-eligibility-title-2-p-3: Prior to using the Services for any purpose, we highly recommend that you read our guides, {article1} and {article2} on for some recommendations on how to be proactive about your security. In addition, we recommend that you review the additional FAQs, tips, and guidelines provided on the Site.
rights-and-restrictions-title-1-p: Our Services are protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of the United States and foreign countries. Except as expressly provided in these Terms, we (or our licensors) exclusively own all right, title and interest in and to the Service, including all associated intellectual property rights. You may not remove, alter or obscure any copyright, trademark, service mark or other proprietary rights notices incorporated in or accompanying the Services, including in any Content. You acknowledge and agree that any feedback, comments or suggestions you may provide regarding the Services will be the sole and exclusive property of MyEtherWallet, and you hereby irrevocably assign to us all of your right, title and interest in and to the foregoing. MyEtherWallet reserves the right to discontinue any aspect of the Site at any time.
rights-and-restrictions-title-2-p-1: The open-source components of our Site are offered under the following license:
rights-and-restrictions-title-2-p-3: Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
rights-and-restrictions-title-3-p: Вы соглашаетесь не (а) вмешиваться, повреждать, ухудшать или отключать действие Услуг любыми средствами (как с помощью автоматических средств, так и любым иным образом), включая загрузку или иное распространение вирусов, шпионских программ, рекламного программного обеспечения или другого вредоносного кода; (b) использовать какие-либо роботы, пауки, скребки или другие автоматизированные средства для доступа к Услугам в любых целях без нашего письменного согласия или в обход заголовков исключения роботов или аналогичных мер; (c) удалять, обходить, отключать, повреждать или иным образом мешать функциям, связанным с безопасностью Услуг, функциям, которые предотвращают или ограничивают использование или копирование любой части Услуг, или функциям, которые обеспечивают ограничения Услуг; (d) предпринимать любые действия, которые налагают или могут наложить, по нашему единоличному усмотрению, необоснованную или непропорционально большую нагрузку на нашу технологическую инфраструктуру или иным образом предъявляют чрезмерные запросы трафика Услуг; (e) использовать Услуги в любых незаконных или несанкционированных целях; кроме того, при использовании Услуг вы не должны нарушать какие-либо законы в вашей юрисдикции (включая, помимо прочего, законы об интеллектуальной собственности); или (f) использовать, в том числе как часть товарных знаков и/или как часть доменных имен, в связи с каким-либо продуктом или услугой любым способом, который может вызвать путаницу и не может быть скопирован, имитирован или использован, полностью или частично, без предварительного письменного разрешения MyEtherWallet.
privacy-title-p: MyEtherWallet’s Privacy Policy applies to the collection and use of “Personal Information,” which is defined as information about an individual that (either by itself or when combined with information from other available sources) allows that individual to be identified. MyEtherWallet’s Privacy Policy is available at {link} and its terms are made a part of these Terms of Service by this reference. You understand that by using the Services you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Information as set forth in our Privacy Policy, and to have your Personal Information collected, used, transferred to and processed in the United States.
third-party-title-p: The Site may contain links and/or access to third-party websites, applications (together, “Third-party Sites”), and/or Application Programming Interfaces (“APIs”) that are not owned or controlled by MyEtherWallet. Access to and use of any Third-party Sites or APIs is at your own risk and we are not responsible for (a) the accuracy or reliability of information on Third-party Sites or APIs; (b) the acts or omissions of the operators of Third-party Sites or APIs (or their partners or affiliates); (c) any loss or damage incurred in connection with the use of any Third-party Sites or APIs, or (d) any transaction you consummate in connection with your use or access of any Third-party Sites or APIs. We encourage you to be aware when you leave the Site and/or access third-party APIs, and to read the terms and privacy policy of each other Third-party Site that you visit or API that you access. We provide such links and access merely as a convenience, and the inclusion of such links or access does not imply an endorsement. Upon leaving the Site and/or when using third-party APIs, these Terms of Service shall no longer govern. By using the Site, you expressly relieve and release MyEtherWallet from any and all liability arising from your use of any Third-party Sites or APIs
disclaimer-titlep-1: YOUR USE OF THE SITE, ITS CONTENT AND ANY SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE SITE IS AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE SITE, ITS CONTENT AND ANY SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE SITE ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS, WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. NEITHER MYETHERWALLET NOR ANY PERSON OR ENTITY ASSOCIATED WITH MYETHERWALLET MAKES ANY WARRANTY OR REPRESENTATION WITH RESPECT TO THE COMPLETENESS, SECURITY, RELIABILITY, QUALITY, ACCURACY OR AVAILABILITY OF THE SITE OR THE SERVICES. WITHOUT LIMITING THE FOREGOING, NEITHER MYETHERWALLET NOR ANY PERSON OR ENTITY ASSOCIATED WITH MYETHERWALLET REPRESENTS OR WARRANTS THAT THE SITE, ITS CONTENT OR ANY SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE SITE WILL BE ACCURATE, RELIABLE, ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, THAT THE SITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES IT AVAILABLE ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS OR THAT THE SITE OR ANY SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE SITE WILL OTHERWISE MEET YOUR NEEDS OR EXPECTATIONS.
disclaimer-titlep-2: MYETHERWALLET HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT AND FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
disclaimer-titlep-3: IN NO EVENT WILL MYETHERWALLET, ITS AFFILIATES OR THEIR LICENSORS, SERVICE PROVIDERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, OFFICERS OR DIRECTORS BE LIABLE FOR DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, UNDER ANY LEGAL THEORY, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE, OR INABILITY TO USE, THE SITE, ANY WEBSITES LINKED TO IT, ANY CONTENT ON THE SITE OR SUCH OTHER WEBSITES, OR ANY SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE SITE OR SUCH OTHER WEBSITES, INCLUDING ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PERSONAL INJURY, PAIN AND SUFFERING, EMOTIONAL DISTRESS, LOSS OF REVENUE, LOSS OF PROFITS, LOSS OF BUSINESS OR ANTICIPATED SAVINGS, LOSS OF USE, LOSS OF GOODWILL, LOSS OF DATA, AND WHETHER CAUSED BY TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), BREACH OF CONTRACT OR OTHERWISE, EVEN IF FORESEEABLE.
disclaimer-titlep-4: The limitations and disclaimers in this section do not purport to limit liability or alter your rights beyond what is permitted by applicable law. MyEtherWallet’s liability shall be limited to the extent permitted by law.
disclaimer-titlep-5: MyEtherWallet is based in the state of California in the United States. We provide this Site for use only by persons located in the United States. We make no claims that the Site or any of its content is accessible or appropriate outside of the United States. Access to the Site may not be legal by certain persons or in certain countries. If you access the Site from outside the United States, you do so on your own initiative and are responsible for compliance with local laws. Similarly, the Site has been translated into a variety of languages. However, MyEtherWallet can only verify the validity and accuracy of the information provided in English and, because of this, the English version of the Site is the official text.
indemnity-title-p: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless MyEtherWallet, its officers, directors, employees and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorneys’ fees) arising from your use of and access to the Services, or your violation of these Terms of Service. This defense and indemnification obligation will survive these Terms of Service and your use of the Services.
assignment-title-p: These Terms of Service, and any rights and licenses granted hereunder, may not be transferred or assigned by you, but may be assigned by MyEtherWallet without restriction.
agreement-waiver-title: 9. Arbitration Agreement; Class Waiver; Jury Waiver
agreement-waiver-title-p-0: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING ARBITRATION AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BECAUSE IT REQUIRES YOU AND MYETHERWALLET TO AGREE TO RESOLVE ALL DISPUTES THROUGH BINDING INDIVIDUAL ARBITRATION, UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED.
agreement-waiver-title-p-1: 9.1 Applicability of Arbitration Agreement. All claims and disputes (excluding claims for injunctive or other equitable relief as set forth below) in connection with the Agreement, including the Terms of Service, that cannot be resolved informally or in small claims court shall be resolved, to the extent permitted by applicable law, by binding arbitration on an individual basis under the terms of this Arbitration Agreement. This Arbitration Agreement applies to you and MyEtherWallet, and to any subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, employees, predecessors in interest, successors, and assigns, as well as all authorized or unauthorized users or beneficiaries of services or goods provided under the Terms of Service.
agreement-waiver-title-p-2: 9.2 Notice Requirement and Informal Dispute Resolution. Before either party may seek arbitration, the party must first send to the other party a written Notice of Dispute ("Notice") describing the nature and basis of the claim or dispute, and the requested relief. A Notice to MyEtherWallet should be sent to: 724 S. Spring St., #1103, Los Angeles, CA 90014, Attention: Legal. After the Notice is received, you and MyEtherWallet may attempt to resolve the claim or dispute informally. If you and MyEtherWallet do not resolve the claim or dispute within 30 days after the Notice is received, either party may begin an arbitration proceeding. The amount of any settlement offer made by any party may not be disclosed to the arbitrator until after the arbitrator has determined the amount of the award, if any, to which either party is entitled.
agreement-waiver-title-p-3: 9.3 Arbitration Rules. Arbitration shall be initiated through the American Arbitration Association ("AAA"), an established alternative dispute resolution provider ("ADR Provider") that offers arbitration as set forth in this section. If AAA is not available to arbitrate, the parties shall agree to select an alternative ADR Provider. The rules of the ADR Provider shall govern all aspects of this arbitration, including but not limited to the method of initiating and/or demanding arbitration, except to the extent such rules conflict with the Terms of Service. The AAA Consumer Arbitration Rules ("Arbitration Rules") governing the arbitration are available online at www.adr.org or by calling the AAA at 1-800-778-7879. The arbitration shall be conducted by a single, neutral arbitrator. Any claims or disputes where the total amount of the award sought is less than ten thousand U.S. Dollars (US $10,000.00) may be resolved through binding non-appearance-based arbitration, at the option of the party seeking relief. For claims or disputes where the total amount of the award sought is ten thousand U.S. Dollars (US $10,000.00) or more, the right to a hearing will be determined by the Arbitration Rules. Any hearing will be held in the city of Los Angeles, California, unless the parties agree otherwise. Any judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator may be entered in any court of competent jurisdiction.
agreement-waiver-title-p-4: 9.4 Additional Rules for Non-Appearance Based Arbitration. If non-appearance arbitration is elected, the arbitration shall be conducted by telephone, online, and/or based solely on written submissions; the specific manner shall be chosen by the party initiating the arbitration.
agreement-waiver-title-p-5: 9.5 Authority of Arbitrator. If arbitration is initiated, the arbitrator will decide the rights and liabilities, if any, of you and MyEtherWallet, and the dispute will not be consolidated with any other matters or joined with any other cases or parties. The arbitrator shall have the authority to grant motions dispositive of all or part of any claim. The arbitrator shall have the authority to award monetary damages and to grant any non-monetary remedy or relief available to an individual under applicable law, the AAA Rules, and the Terms of Service. The arbitrator shall issue a written award and statement of decision describing the essential findings and conclusions on which the award is based, including the calculation of any damages awarded. The arbitrator has the same authority to award relief on an individual basis that a judge in a court of law would have. The award of the arbitrator is final and binding upon you and MyEtherWallet.
agreement-waiver-title-p-6: 9.6 Waiver of Jury Trial. THE PARTIES HEREBY WAIVE THEIR CONSTITUTIONAL AND STATUTORY RIGHTS TO GO TO COURT AND HAVE A TRIAL IN FRONT OF A JUDGE OR A JURY, instead electing that all claims and disputes shall be resolved by arbitration under this Arbitration Agreement, excluding claims for injunctive or other equitable relief as set forth below. Arbitration procedures are typically more limited, more efficient, and less costly than court proceedings and are subject to very limited review by a court. If any litigation should arise between you and MyEtherWallet in any state or federal court in a suit to vacate or enforce an arbitration award or otherwise, YOU AND MYETHERWALLET WAIVE ALL RIGHTS TO A JURY TRIAL, instead electing that the dispute be resolved by a judge.
agreement-waiver-title-p-7: 9.7 Waiver of Class or Consolidated Actions. ALL CLAIMS AND DISPUTES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THIS ARBITRATION AGREEMENT MUST BE ARBITRATED OR LITIGATED ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS AND NOT ON A CLASS BASIS, AND CLAIMS OF MORE THAN ONE CUSTOMER OR USER CANNOT BE ARBITRATED OR LITIGATED JOINTLY OR CONSOLIDATED WITH THOSE OF ANY OTHER CUSTOMER OR USER.
agreement-waiver-title-p-8: 9.8 Severability. If any part or parts of this Arbitration Agreement are found under the law to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, then such specific part or parts shall be of no force and effect and shall be severed, and the remainder of the Arbitration Agreement shall continue in full force and effect.
agreement-waiver-title-p-9: 9.9 Right to Waive. Any or all of the rights and limitations set forth in this Arbitration Agreement may be waived by the party against whom the claim is asserted. Such waiver shall not waive or affect any other portion of this Arbitration Agreement.
agreement-waiver-title-p-10: 9.10 Survival of Agreement. This Arbitration Agreement will survive the termination of your relationship with MyEtherWallet.
agreement-waiver-title-p-11: 9.11 Суд мелких тяжб. Несмотря на вышесказанное, индивидуальный иск в суд мелких тяжб может быт представлен как вами, так и MyEtherWallet.
agreement-waiver-title-p-12: 9.12 Справедливые меры судебной защиты. Несмотря на вышесказанное, любая из сторон может обратиться в суд компетентной юрисдикции с иском о справедливых мерах судебной защиты в отношении предполагаемого незаконного использования авторских прав, товарных знаков, торговых наименований, логотипов, коммерческих тайн или патентов или с иском о чрезвычайных справедливых мерах судебной защиты в суде компетентной юрисдикции для сохранения статуса-кво во время ожидания арбитража. Запрос о принятии временных мер не будет считаться отказом от каких-либо других прав или обязательств по настоящему Арбитражному соглашению.
governing-law-title-p-1: To the extent the parties are permitted under these Terms of Service to initiate litigation in court, both you and MyEtherWallet agree that all claims and disputes, including statutory claims and disputes, arising out of or relating to the Agreement, including the Terms of Service, shall be governed in all respects by the substantive law of the state of California, without regard to its conflict of law principles. You and MyEtherWallet hereby consent to submit to the jurisdiction of the federal and state courts sitting in the state of California for any actions, suits, or proceedings arising out of or relating to the Agreement, including the Terms of Service, that are not subject to the Arbitration Agreement.
governing-law-title-p-2: YOU AND MYETHERWALLET AGREE THAT ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE SERVICES MUST COMMENCE WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION ACCRUES. OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION IS PERMANENTLY BARRED TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.
entire-agreement-title-p: The Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, any other legal notices published by MyEtherWallet on the Site shall constitute the entire agreement between you and MyEtherWallet concerning the Services. If any provision of these Terms of Service is deemed invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these Terms of Service, which shall remain in full force and effect. No waiver of any term of these Terms of Service shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or any other term, and MyEtherWallet’s failure to assert any right or provision under these Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
contact-info-title-p: We welcome your comments or questions about these Terms of Service. You may contact us at {suppEmail}
